doc:
Ben Welden https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ben_Welden 0 Ben Welden (June 12, 1901 – October 17, 1997) was an American character actor who played a wide variety of Damon Runyon-type gangsters in various movies and television shows. He appeared in over 200 films between 1930 and 1966. He served in the U.S. Army during World War II. Ben_Welden ( June_12_,_1901 – October_17_,_1997 ) was an_American_character_actor who played a_wide_variety of Damon_Runyon-type_gangsters in various_movies_and_television_shows . He appeared in over_200_films between 1930_and_1966 . He served in the_U.S._Army during World_War_II .
